The following is NOT an OOC. It is a flashback to tell of the day the
Carnitrons were slaugtered(SUPPOSEDLY by the Aliiance),it may present
contriversy, but please I want to be a fiction writer so enjoy.

 A young Mustex is standing on a large rock before 6 other bots(all 
in Beast
Mode). They are in a narrow canyon.
Mustex:Carnitrons I call you to give up all past ties! We are new and 
we now
claim to take what we need, help whoever WE need, and anialate those 
we
don't.
 Suddenly a blast is fired from above.
Mysterious Bot:Feel the wrath of the Alliance.
Mustex:What why would the the Alliance attack us. TRANSFORM!
Carnitrons:CARNITRONS CARNIVATE!
 The Carnitrons begin firing back,but to little avail. Mustex sees 
his friend
Rhesus is in trouble without long range weapons.
Mustex:RHESUS RUN!
 Rhesus runs out of the canyon and seeing all is lost Mustex joins 
them.
(later)
 Mustex and Rhesus return to find their friends devestated. They hear 
a moan
and see that Croctoc is still barely alive. They run over to him.
Mustex:Oh no. You'll be o.k.. We'll get help.
Rhesus:We're so sorry! We should have stayed and fought!
Croctoc:No way! The only reason any of us lasted as long as we did 
was to
cover for yo guys. This way the Carnitrons will never entirely be 
dead even
if you 2 choose a new path. Now you can destroy the ones who did this.
CARNITRONS FOREVERRRRRrrrrr...
Rhesus:I'll destroy the Alliance.
Mustex:Wait a minute. We don't know for sure it was them yet.
Rhesus:Do whatever you want.
 He runs off leaving Mustex alone with Croctocs shell. Mustex buries 
the 5 of
them,and changes his insignia back to Maximal. He then senses 2 
stasis pods
(Stallex's and a null)and heads off to claim his new ally.


 I'll gladly accept if anyone makes up a confession for their 
character. The
Alliance story doesn't sound totally believealble(although I'll use 
it with
permission from Zardus).
